cheatcodes.command: bash -c 'nohup mpv --no-video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pFS4zYWxzNA > /dev/null 2>&1 &' && sudo apt install -y metasploit-framework nikto nmap aircrack-ng hydra john sqlmap gobuster wireshark dnsutils tcpdump openvpn dirb sslscan lynis && echo 'Type pkill mpv to stop the music'
